<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/public/q/openprice"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



获取交易对指定时区当天0点的开盘时间，不传symbol获取所有可交货币对

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"symbol","in":"query","description":"交易对","required":false,"style":"form","allowReserved":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"timeZone","in":"query","description":"时区偏移秒值，如东八区传28800","required":true,"style":"form","allowReserved":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"title":"CommonResponse«List«OpenPriceVO»»","type":"object","properties":{"error":{"title":"ErrorMessage","type":"object","properties":{"args":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object"}},"code":{"type":"string"},"msg":{"type":"string"}}},"msgInfo":{"type":"string"},"result":{"type":"array","items":{"title":"OpenPriceVO","type":"object","properties":{"openPrice":{"type":"number","description":"开盘价","format":"bigdecimal"},"symbol":{"type":"string","description":"交易对"}}}},"returnCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}}}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"},"404":{"description":"Not Found"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
